name: Mathematics 101
description: I have been tutoring Mathematics, Physics, Electrical Engineering and MATLAB for more than 10 years now.I specialize in helping with problem-solving techniques, preparing for a test and numerical analysis.

name: Algebra
description: Algebra course is to develop the idea on different topics of algebra. The course starts with the discussion on the concepts of Functions. It includes the discussion on how to write different types of linear equation, linear inequalities, evaluation of linear function.

name: Intro Stats / AP Statistics Course
description: Statistics course gives an overview of various topics related to Statistics and Probability. The aim of this course is to provide an explanation about the types of data and statistics.

name: Physics 101 Mechanics Course
description: Physics 101 Mechanics course focuses on fundamental physics ideas and their applications in everyday life. One learns the fundamental principles of physical laws and how to apply them to the behavior of objects by studying the physics of motion from the ground up.

name: Geometry and Polygon Course
description: Geometry is the branch of Mathematics that deals with different geometric figures and their properties.Geometry course gives an idea of types of lines, parallel and perpendicular lines, Types of triangles as Right Triangles, Relationship within Triangles, Circle, Terminology, Volume.

name: Coding and Programming Crash Course
description: I am a qualified software engineer. I am very good at C, C++, Java, Python, Data Structure, Operating systems, and other computer science subjects.

name: Electricity and Magnetism Course
description: Mechanical and Manufacturing Engineer at Air Taxi startup. Academic Background in Mechanical Engineering, Computer Science and Mathematics.

name: Sports and Fitness Course
description: Sports Management course is offered for those who have a knack for management and loves to pursue a career in the sports industry. Candidates in the field of Sports Management are expected to hold planning, organising, controlling, budgeting, or directing skills in an organisation that deals in the sports business

name: IELTS Course
description: The course provides the discussion on the grammatical part and the reading,speaking and writing sections of English.

name: Precalculus Course
description: The main idea of calculus aim is to clear the concept of rational numbers, functions, definition and properties, types of functions, transformation.

name: Organic Chemistry Course
description: Chemistry course deals with the organic branch of chemistry. It starts off with the introduction to organic chemistry, which aids in building the foundation for all the other topics to be discussed in the course.

name: Biology & Zoology Course
description: Biology is the branch of science that deals with living organisms (also viruses, which are neither living nor dead) and the components they are made up of. The basic unit of a living system is a cell that comprises various interacting chemical entities.

name: ICT Crash Course
description: ICT course discusses the ICT test by showcasing the information and communications  section of the test followed by the reading and the Science section.

name: Computer Science Crash Course
description: CS course aims to develop basic programming skills among students. It begins with the computer science overview. Then, it introduces Java concepts focusing on the basic syntax and structure of the programs in Java. It then explains about various data types in Java, and the declaration
